name: Reported polio cases per 100,000 people
descriptionShort: The number of reported polio cases per 100,000 people in the United States in a given year.
datasetName: Long-run reported polio cases in the United States

origins.title: Historical polio cases in the United States - Public Health Reports
origins.description:
Data on historical polio cases in the United States, compiled from a selection of sources from the United States - Public Health Reports.

Sources for each year are as follows:

* 1910-11: [Public Health Reports Vol. 27, No. 16 “Poliomyelitis in the United States, 1910 and 1911"](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4567726?seq=4)

* 1913: [Public Health Reports Vol. 29, No. 28 “The Notifiable Diseases: Their Prevalence by States during 1913”](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4570998?seq=12)

* 1914: [Public Health Reports Vol. 39, No. 36 “The Notifiable Diseases: Reported Prevalence during 1914 by States”](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4572751?seq=7)

* 1915-1937: [Public Health Reports Vol. 54, No. 21 “Prevalence of Poliomyelitis in the United States in 1938”](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4582892?seq=1)

* 1938: [Public Health Reports Vol. 55, No. 10 “Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1938: Morbidity and Mortality Summaries for Certain Important Communicable Diseases"](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4583204?seq=1)

* 1939: [Public Health Reports, Vol. 56, No. 7 - Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1939: Morbidity and Mortality Summaries for Certain Important Communicable Diseases (1941)](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4583620)

* 1940: [Public Health Reports, Vol. 57, No. 7 - Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1940: Morbidity and Mortality Summaries for Certain Important Communicable Diseases (1942)](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4584013)

* 1942-1947: [Public Health Reports Vol. 63, No. 13 - Incidence of Poliomyelitis in 1947](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4586491)

* 1948-1949: [Public Health Reports Vol. 67, No. 6 - Poliomyelitis in the United States, 1951](https://www.jstor.org/stable/4588131)
origins.citationFull:
Public Health Reports Vol. 27, No. 16 “Poliomyelitis in the United States, 1910 and 1911"

Public Health Reports Vol. 29, No. 28 “The Notifiable Diseases: Their Prevalence by States during 1913”

Public Health Reports, Vol. 56, No. 7 - Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1939: Morbidity and Mortality Summaries for Certain Important Communicable Diseases (1941)

Public Health Reports, Vol. 57, No. 7 - Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1940: Morbidity and Mortality Summaries for Certain Important Communicable Diseases (1942)

origins.title: Historical diphtheria cases in the United States - United States Census Bureau
origins.description:
Data on historical diphtheria cases in the United States, from the United States Census Bureau.

* 1941: [Statistical Abstract of the United States: 1944-45 (Part 2 - Vital Statistics, Page 82)](https://www.census.gov/library/publications/1945/compendia/statab/66ed.html)
origins.citationFull: Statistical Abstract of the United States: 1944-45 (1945), United States Census Bureau.

origins.title: Historical polio cases in the United States - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
origins.description:
Data on historical polio cases in the United States, compiled from a selection of sources from the US CDC.

Sources for each year are as follows:

* 1950-1960: [Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report Annual Supplement Summary 1993 Vol. 9, No. 53 by the Communicable Disease Center, Public Health Service, U.S. Department of Health Education and Welfare.](https://www.globalhealthchronicles.org/items/show/6303)

* 1961-1993: [Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 1993](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/00035381.htm)

* 1994-2001: [PART 3: Historical Summaries of Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1969–2000; Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report, Vol. 49, No. 53, Summary of Notifiable Diseases — United States, 2000](https://www.jstor.org/stable/23310295?seq=2)

* 2002: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2002](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5153a1.htm)

* 2003: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2003](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5254a1.htm)

* 2004: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2004](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5353a1.htm)

* 2005: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2005](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5453a1.htm)

* 2006: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2006](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5553a1.htm)

* 2007: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2007](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5653a1.htm)

* 2008: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2008](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5754a1.htm)

* 2009: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2009](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5853a1.htm)

* 2010: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2010](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5953a1.htm)

* 2011: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2011](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm6053a1.htm)

* 2012: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2012](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm6153a1.htm)

* 2013: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2013](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm6253a1.htm)

* 2014: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2014](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/63/wr/mm6354a1.htm)

* 2015: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2015](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/64/wr/mm6453a1.htm)

* 2016-2022: [National Notifiable Diseases Surveillance System (NNDSS) - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)](https://wonder.cdc.gov/nndss-annual-summary.html)
origins.producer: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
origins.citationFull:

Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 1993

Historical Summaries of Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1969–2000; Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report, Vol. 49, No. 53, Summary of Notifiable Diseases — United States, 2000

Summary of Notifiable Diseases --- United States, 2002-2015

National Notifiable Diseases Surveillance System (NNDSS) - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

origins.title: Population
origins.description:
Our World in Data builds and maintains a long-run dataset on population by country, region, and for the world, based on various sources.

You can find more information on these sources and how our time series is constructed on this page: https://ourworldindata.org/population-sources
origins.citationFull: The long-run data on population is based on various sources, described on this page: https://ourworldindata.org/population-sources
